mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_token (user_id, access_token, refresh_token, device_type, device_id, ip_address, create_time, access_token_expires_at, refresh_token_expires_at, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{accessToken}, #{refreshToken}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceId}, #{ipAddress}, #{createTime}, #{accessTokenExpiresAt}, #{refreshTokenExpiresAt}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_token WHERE refresh_token = #{refreshToken} and status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.update: UPDATE user_token SET access_token = #{accessToken}, access_token_expires_at = #{accessTokenExpiresAt} WHERE refresh_token = #{refreshToken} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
UPDATE user_token SET status = #{status} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND device_id = #{deviceId}
